DOC.brief_title: MeFirst : A Tailored Intervention HPV Vaccine Decision Making
DOC.detailed_description: MeFirst first web-based , online , educational tool design promote Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) vaccine awareness understand effort improve HPV vaccine intent uptake among female university student . HPV common sexually transmitted infection cause genital wart cancer . The HPV vaccine recommend girl age 11-26 since 2006 , yet vaccination rate remain low . Tailored online intervention may effective tool promote behavior change among college student traditional static intervention . The propose study randomize control trial test efficacy MeFirst tool vs. standard static educational material increase HPV vaccination intent uptake among female university student age 18-26 .
